title: Enhanced detection of aromatic oxidation products using NO3- chemical ionization mass spectrometry with limited nitric acid

Nitrate ion-based chemical ionization mass spectrometry (NO3--CIMS) is widely used for detection of highly oxygenated organic molecules (HOM). HOM are known to participate in molecular clustering, new particle formation and...
